text:
Termin przesłuchania:
wstępnie połowa stycznia 2025

5.04 (sob) – cały dzień / Aula
6.04 (nie) – cały dzień / Aula
7.04 (pon) – 9:00-18.30 / Sala Koncertowa
8.04 (wto)– 8:30-13:30, 17:30-21:30 / Sala Koncertowa
9.04 (śro) – 8:30-13:30, 17:30-21:30 / Sala Koncertowa

10 kwietnia godz. 19:00 / Czwartki z aMuz
Wydanie: NOVELO HANDEL EDITION
Numery, które będą wykonywane:
PART ONE
Sinfonia
Comfort ye my people (T)
Ev’ry valley….. (T)
And the glory… (Chorus)
Thus saith the Lord (B)
But who may abide… (A)
And he shall purify (Ch)
Behold, a virgin… (A)
O thou that tellest… (A and Ch)
For behold, darkness… (B)
The people that…. (B)
For unto us…. (Ch)
Pifa (orch)
There were shepherds…. (S); And lo. the angel…. (S)
And the angel…. (S)
And suddenly…. (S)
Glory to God (Ch)
Rejoice greatly….. (S)
The shall…
He shall feed… (A and S)
His yoke is easy… (Ch)
PART TWO
Behold the Lamb…. (Ch)
He was despised (A)
Surely he hath…. (Ch)
And with his…. (Ch)
All we like sheep… (Ch)
All they that see… (T)
He trusted… (Ch)
trans:

tentatively mid-January 2025
